mapper.select: select contract_id as contractId, product_id as productId, contract_year as contractYear, contract_price as contractPrice from contract where product_id = #{productId} and contract_id = #{contractId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(order_id, user_id, order_content, order_date, request_date, order_name, order_state, order_address, order_price, rental_price) values (#{orderId},#{userId},#{orderContent},SYSDATE, #{requestDate}, #{orderName}, #{orderState}, #{orderAddress}, #{orderPrice}, #{rentalPrice})
INSERT INTO order_detail(order_detail_id, order_id, contract_id, product_id, order_count) values (#{orderDetailId},#{orderId},#{contractId},#{productId}, 1)
